entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
